Uses of Interface
com.googlecode.sarasvati.JoinStrategy

    Package Description

      JoinStrategy Node.getJoinStrategy(Arc arc)
      Returns the JoinStrategy to be used when an ArcToken arrives at this Node.

    • Uses of JoinStrategy in com.googlecode.sarasvati.join

      Classes in com.googlecode.sarasvati.join that implement JoinStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AndJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy in which nodes will wait for arc tokens to be present on all incoming arcs before completing the join.
      class  ClassJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy that assumes the join param is the name of class which implements JoinStrategy.
      class  JoinLangJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy that evaluates the join parameter in the target node as a statement of JoinLang.
      class  LabelJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy in which nodes will wait for arc tokens to be present on all incoming arcs which share the same name as the current incoming arc token before completing the join.
      class  MergeJoinStrategy
      Class for JoinStrategies which wish to first attempt a merge, then fall back to another join strategy if that fails.
      class  OrJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy where a node will complete a join whenever any arc token arrives.
      class  TokenSetJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy in which nodes will wait for for all active arc tokens in a given token set to arrive at that node, and for there to be no active node tokens in the token set.
      class  TokenSetOrJoinStrategy
      Implements a join strategy in which nodes will wait for for all active arc tokens in a given token set to arrive at that node, and for there to be no active node tokens in the token set.
      Methods in com.googlecode.sarasvati.join that return JoinStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected JoinStrategy ClassJoinStrategy.getJoinStrategy(String className) 
      Constructors in com.googlecode.sarasvati.join with parameters of type JoinStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      MergeJoinStrategy(JoinStrategy fallbackJoinStrategy)
